overview:
Jon Gillespie Brown is the founder and CEO of a number of successful hi-tech companies.

In tandem with his Entrepreneurial commitments Jon actively promotes the concept of contribution and giving back and has provided mentor support to students at the London Business School for 8 years and is also a Mentor at Stanford University for 5 years, California where a number of his businesses and family are now based.

Jon Gillespie Brown brings his extensive mentoring experience to bear in this new handbook for would-be Entrepreneurs - So you want to be an Entrepreneur?

Drawing on his own experience as a successful serial Entrepreneur and those of his vast network, Jon guides the reader through a series of mentoring sessions, educating them on the realities of the Entrepreneurial lifestyle and addressing their personality and ambitions to determine if this is the life for them.
